title: 1 路 Safety
subtitle: Body first
description: Feeling safe, supported, and regulated enough to engage with intimacy without spiraling.

title: 2 路 Emotional Security & Trust
subtitle: Self-trust, boundaries
description: Feeling anchored enough to explore desire without fear or collapse.

title: 3 路 Relational Connection
subtitle: Exploration with others
description: Safe, shame-free, consensual connection for touch, sex, and play.

title: 4 路 Deep Intimacy
subtitle: Integration & expression
description: Freedom to express sexuality fully, with or without a partner, without pressure.
